8.label: Switch reaction to alarm
8.description: What do to when an alarm is recieved

options.label: Turn the switch on and off

9[0x01].label: Alarm reaction to Access Control trigger state
9[0x01].description: React to access control triggers from other Z-Wave devices.

9[0x0100].label: Alarm reaction to Smoke Alarms
9[0x0100].description: React to Smoke Alarms from other Z-Wave devices.

9[0x0200].label: Alarm reaction to CO Alarms
9[0x0200].description: React to CO Alarms from other Z-Wave devices.

9[0x0400].label: Alarm reaction to CO2 Alarms

9[0x0800].label: Alarm reaction to Heart Alarms
9[0x0800].description: React to Heart Alarms from other Z-Wave devices.

9[0x1000].label: Alarm reaction to Water Alarms
9[0x1000].description: React to Water Alarms from other Z-Wave devices.

9[0x2000].label: Alarm reaction to Access Control Alarms
9[0x2000].description: React to Access Control Alarms from other Z-Wave devices.

9[0x4000].label: Alarm reaction to Home Security Alarms
9[0x4000].description: React to Home Security Alarms from other Z-Wave devices.

10.label: Release/Disable alarm
10.description: Sets how you are able to disable Smart Switch 7s alarm state

18.label: Flash frequency
18.description: Configures the LED flash frequency and amount of time

19.label: Start/Stop LED flash
19.description: Sets the timeframe of flashing in seconds

20.label: Power restored state
20.description: Switches state after an power outage

80.label: Status Update
80.description: Determine which reports are sent to your gateway

81.label: LED indicator mode
81.description: Allows you to configure how the LED indicator works

82[0xff000000].label: Night Light enable (hour)
82[0xff000000].description: Enable or disable Night Light Mode during specific times

82[0xff0000].label: Night Light enable (minute)
82[0xff0000].description: Enable or disable Night Light Mode during specific times

82[0xff00].label: Night Light disable (hour)
82[0xff00].description: Enable or disable Night Light Mode during specific times

82[0xff].label: Night Light disable (minute)
82[0xff].description: Enable or disable Night Light Mode during specific times

91.label: Watt threshold
91.description: When to send a watt report

92.label: kWh threshold
92.description: When to send a kWh report

93.label: Current threshold
93.description: When to send a current report

111.label: Timed report interval
111.description: Reports the sensors set on Parameter 101
